author: Mercy Montgomery
text:
We're working to create a comprehensive social media engagement plan and are interested in what guidelines are commonly used to help screen content submissions from the public, especially events. 
What criteria do you use to identify events that are relevant to the City or County page and what types of submissions don't get included in your social media content?
Thanks!
Mercy Montgomery
title: Social Media Events: guidelines for screening outside submissions
